sections.Benefit: This feat enables you to attract a loyal cohort and a number of devoted subordinates who assist you. A cohort is generally an NPC with class levels, while followers are typically lower level NPCs. See Table: Leadership for what level of cohort and how many followers you can recruit.
sections.Special: The feat Monstrous Companion counts as the Leadership feat for the purposes of prerequisites. A character cannot have both Leadership and Monstrous Companion.
